sentences.en: He is the most impudent fellow in nature.
sentences.cn: 他是世界上最厚颜无耻的家伙.

sentences.en: He needed soft looks and caresses too much ever to be impudent.
sentences.cn: 他需要温柔的眼光和抚爱,需要得那么多,从来不感到过分.

sentences.en: I had better tell you that that letter of Monsieur Ferrand's to mother was impudent.
sentences.cn: 我还是告诉你的好,费朗德先生给母亲的信是荒唐失礼的.

sentences.en: It is the most impudent piece of pretension I ever heard of in my life.
sentences.cn: 这是我一生中从没听说过的最厚颜无耻的一项要求了.

sentences.en: It was impudent of her to answer like that.
sentences.cn: 她竟那样回答,真太放肆了.

sentences.en: It was impudent of him to say so.
She's tolerant toward those impudent colleagues.
sentences.cn: 她对那些无礼的同事采取容忍的态度.

sentences.en: Some of them spoke pleasantly and were well behaved, while others were impudent and insulting.
sentences.cn: 他们当中的一些人谈吐不俗、举止得体，而另一些人则行为不恭、傲慢无礼。

sentences.en: Some of them were impudent and insulting.
sentences.cn: 他们当中的一些人放肆无礼，目中无人。

sentences.en: That impudent boy put his tongue out at me.
sentences.cn: 那个无礼的男孩冲着我吐舌头.

sentences.en: That impudent fellow needs to be sat on firmly.
sentences.cn: 那个无礼的家伙需要狠狠地教训一顿才是.

sentences.en: The impudent boys put their tongues out at us.
sentences.cn: 那些厚脸皮的男孩儿朝着我们伸舌头.

sentences.en: The teacher threatened to kick the impudent pupil out of the room.
sentences.cn: 老师威胁着要把这无礼的小学生撵出教室.

sentences.en: Think the world is as bold and impudent as you?
sentences.cn: 不是人人都像你一样直接粗俗的!

sentences.en: Why will you tolerate that impudent fellow?
sentences.cn: 你为什么要忍受那个冒失的家伙 呢 ?

trans.tran_en: rude and showing no respect to other people
